pageContext.claim: “That's a million and a half jobs [from Saudi deals].”
pageContext.analysis: The president's numbers change from day to day, from hundreds of thousands to as much as 1.5 million jobs. He is both exaggerating the number of jobs that would be created even if all of the $110 billion in purported sales were actually inked — and misleading about where they would be created. Many would end up in Saudi Arabia, according to our analysis.
